channel.title: Hugo on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on My New Hugo Site

item.title: So, I made this site...
item.description: Creating this site was my first experience creating a static website since the introductory days of my coding bootcamp. There’s not a lot to it (intentionally) but I thought I would reflect here on some of my observations using Hugo in conjunction with a blog template to create the bones of this site.
